function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Managers not networking and sharing information about adaptive responses to COVID-19","Impact":"Lack of adaptive responses and trade-off solutions, potential increase in transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Encourage networking and knowledge sharing among managers, provide support for adaptive responses","Technologies":"Communication platforms, collaboration tools","People":"City managers, park managers, political leaders","Owner":"City authorities, government agencies, policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of leadership and interest in investing in green areas","Impact":"Neglect of green areas, lack of resources for pandemic response and future shocks","Mitigation":"Promote leadership and interest in green area investment, allocate budget for green area management","Technologies":"Green area management tools, budget allocation software","People":"Political leaders, park managers, agency leaders","Owner":"Political leaders, government agencies, park agencies"},{"Description":"Limited participation of neighbors and stakeholders in governance of green areas in Latin America","Impact":"Conventional governance approach, lack of community involvement, potential governance challenges during pandemic and future shocks","Mitigation":"Encourage community involvement, improve governance structures, promote stakeholder participation","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, governance software","People":"Neighbors, stakeholders, governance authorities","Owner":"Local government, community organizations, governance experts"}]}
